about_the_game:
Strap into the cockpit of your Arduxim and take on enemy starships in this first-person tactical space shooter. Navigate through dangerous ice crystal fields, take hyper gates to other systems, take on enormous capital ships and more.

This demo contains the first two missions of the campaign, the tutorial and a practice mode. It also includes the online multiplayer to test your skills against other pilots.

The full game contains:
A twelve mission campaign
Unlocked ship and weapon choices in multiplayer
Survival/horde challenge mode with online leaderboard
More types of enemies, more environments and more weapons

Starfighter Arduxim requires a gamepad, joystick or HOTAS. Controls are fully customisable.
